mean_en: to trick or cheat someone or something in order to get money :to use fraud in order to get money from a person, an organization, etc.
sentence: This crafty fox defrauds others by pretending to be a beautiful female.
sentence_trans: 这只狡猾的狐狸伪装成美女来诈骗。
word_etyma: de 加强意义 + fraud=fraus=deceit欺诈 → vt. 欺骗
